Greetings, gems! We’ve made some dazzling developments to keep your game shining like new. Update now for the best experience and thanks for playing.

Happy Holidays! Introducing 30 New Levels with Sassy Sleetslope and Saccharin Skihouse for you to ski through this festive season. Also, our buddies Corvus and Felis are giving away Blazing rewards in Events all through December. Thanks for playing!

Hello, Stars! Celebrate the season of love with a romantic new island, Botanical Bloomdale, and play through 15 amorous levels! Also, don't forget to join the most awaited 'Gems and Roses' event to win lovely rewards. Thanks for playing!
Shine through 15 scintillating levels in Awe-inspiring Acropolis, the newest island in Bejeweled Stars.

New Island = New Levels!

Celebrate the onset of Spring with Festive Fairyland, a collection of 15 handcrafted levels we've made for you!
Hello, Gems! Your favorite gem-matching game just got shinier with some behind-the-scenes improvements. Thanks for playing and don't forget to rate us after each update.

Hello, Stars! Now you can link the game with your Apple account to save your progress. We’ve also made some sparkling enhancements to keep your game shining like new. Thanks for your continued support.
Hello, Gems! Your favorite gem-matching game just got shinier with some behind-the-scenes improvements. Thanks for playing and don't forget to rate us after each update.

Hello Gems!

This update will address the bugs reported by some of you and ensure a smooth gameplay experience for everybody.

We sincerely thank you all for the endearing support you've given us. Please reach out to us on smarturl.it/BJSHelp for more.
Hello, Gems! Your favorite gem-matching game just got shinier with some behind-the-scenes improvements. Thanks for playing and don't forget to rate us after each update.

Hello, Gems!

The Facebook sign-in issue has been fixed, so you can login to your account and continue the journey across our star-studded islands. Please ensure you're on iOS 14.5.1 for this to work.

Do reach out to us on help.ea.com for any assistance.

Thanks for your support and don't forget to rate us!
